content.text:
# Tito Warnholtz

Rudolf "Tito" Warnholtz (17 February 1906 in Hamburg â€“ 12 January 1993 in Hamburg) was a German field hockey player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics.
He was a member of the German field hockey team, which won the silver medal. He played one match as goalkeeper.
